Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.binding

Annotation Type Bind

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target({TYPE,FIELD})
@Repeatable(BindRepeatable.class)
public @interface Bind
    This annotation is used to bind classes to each other.

    This annotation is applicable to classes and fields.

    There is no universal usage of this annotation. It is implemented specifically for each module of Neptune. To make it with more comfort you can use Bind.DefaultBindReader.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element Description
      Class<?> to  

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      Class<?>[] exclude  
      boolean withSubclasses  

    • Element Detail

      • to

        Class<?> to
        Returns:
        Class to apply the binding

      • withSubclasses

        boolean withSubclasses
        Returns:
        to apply the binding to subclasses of a class defined by to()
        Default:
        false

      • exclude

        Class<?>[] exclude
        Returns:
        which classes should be excluded from the binding. It has sense when withSubclasses() is true
        Default:
        {}
